text:
The .NET tasks (CSC and ILASM, at least) always echo the command they are about
to execute.  This can make ANT output difficult to read, particularly when many
files are being compiled.  This echo should either be eliminated or made
optional (e.g. with a verbose="true/false" attribute)
creator: mschilling@amberpoint.com
stevel@apache.org
text: CSC and WSDL are fixed btw, just ILASM to do.
fixed this, even reduced the "compiling 27 files" message to verbose level.
creator: stevel@apache.org
